details:
noun
- an electronic memory device
= example: an electronic memory device
= synonyms: storage
- the power of retaining and recalling past experience
= example: the power of retaining and recalling past experience
= synonyms: retention
- the cognitive processes whereby past experience is remembered
= example: the cognitive processes whereby past experience is remembered
= synonyms: remembering
- something that is remembered
= example: something that is remembered
- the area of cognitive psychology that studies memory processes
= example: the area of cognitive psychology that studies memory processes
